About

General theme: multimodal interaction, digital sensory simulation, tech in elderly pedagogy, educational tools Inquisitive mind. Well-versed in SPSS, R and Python. I always look for learning chances to improve myself. Kaggle is my favorite platform to learn about data science and applied machine learning. I am passionate about studying how computer systems can help people learn better, and understanding computer affordances in creating exciting experiences.

Projects

Taste+

First of its kind to augment flavors. Using electricity to stimulate taste buds.

Virtual Cocktail

A digital flavor glass

Tainted

A first-person-shooter game where you have to rely on the sense of smell to find clues and escape from a ghost.

Season Traveller

Multisensory mobile VR experience with smells, thermal, wind

Windy Wall

A multi-panel platform to afford creative wind design

Hacking Occupational Therapy Devices for Commynity Center Care

A low-cost hack to aid Occupational Therapists in monitoring patients' training.

VIHA

Evaluate anatomy learning efficiency from a virtual interactive human body.
